name: manifold-discord-bot
description: Discord bot that uses reactions to place bets on Manifold Markets.

scripts.start: yarn build:watch "ENVIRONMENT=PROD nodemon --watch lib --exec node lib/index.js"
scripts.dev: yarn build:watch "ENVIRONMENT=DEV nodemon --watch lib --exec node lib/index.js"
scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn --cwd=../../common alias && yarn alias && yarn dist
scripts.dist:copy: cp -R ../../common/lib/* dist/common/lib && cp -R ./lib/* dist/backend/discord-bot/lib && cp ../../yarn.lock dist && cp package.json dist
